short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to hide sponsored products from Amazon search results, showing you more of the stuff you were actually looking for

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a very simple Chrome extension which just does one thing - it hides sponsored items in the Amazon online store using CSS attributes. 

No more "Sponsored" items, no more "Featured from our brands" etc :-)

Source code, such as it is, can be found on GitHub:
https://github.com/martin-hamilton/banish-amazon-sponsored

Updated Feb 2023: revised to take account of Amazon's latest technique for smuggling sponsored items onto the page after it has loaded. Cheeky!
